com.atn010.infoxyz

Class ConnectionLogic

  • com.atn010.infoxyz.ConnectionLogic

  • public class ConnectionLogic

    This class manages the connection between Client and Broker for both Sending and Receiving messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      ConnectionLogic()
      This class manages the connection between Client and Broker for both Sending and Receiving messages.

      • transactionRequest

        public void transactionRequest()

        This method send a request for Transaction Information by checking if the Client i connected to the broker, and attempt to connect if it wasn't connected already. and publish the message to the corresponding topic with the message: "request".

        var topicTransactionRequest = "transaction/request/" + clientID
        var payload = ""

      • transferRequest

        public void transferRequest(java.lang.String target,
                            long amount)

        This method send a request for Transfer by checking if the Client i connected to the broker, and attempt to connect if it wasn't connected already.

        get the current date and time and publish the message to the corresponding topic with the message containing: Date time~SenderAccount~ReceiverAccount~AmountOfMoney.

        var topicTransferRequest = "transfer/request/" + clientID
        var payload = ""

        Parameters:
        target - the Recipient of the Transfer request
        amount - the Amount of money wished to be Transfered

      • verificationRequest

        public void verificationRequest(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)

        This method send a request for verification by checking if the Client i connected to the broker, and attempt to connect if it wasn't connected already.

        get the current date and time and publish the message to the corresponding topic with the message containing: Date time~username~password.

        var topicVerificationRequest = "verification/request/" + clientID
        var payload = ""

        Parameters:
        username - the username of the requester
        password - the password of the requester

      • messageToServer

        public org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttMessage messageToServer(java.lang.String payload)

        This method configure the payload and return MqttMessage for delivery.

        payload: String

        Parameters:
        payload - The String of Message wished to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        message MQTTMessage, a Byte Array
